options.label: I agree when entering my data, SHL will collect this data to provide the services you request and keep you up to date on our latest events and news. You are not required to supply any of the information that we may request. However, failure to do so may result in our being unable to provide the documents you desire to download. cards.title: SHL Medical expert to speak at Novartis Campus in Basel
cards.content: SHL Medical will be in Basel for the Drug-Device Combination Products for Parenteral Use workshop.

cards.title: Strengthening a global manufacturing network through advanced simulation technologies
cards.content: In the Pre-filled Syringes and Injection Devices Issue of ONdrug Delivery Magazine, published ahead of the 2023 PDA Universe.

cards.title: SHL to attend 2022 NSTC Science Train Program
cards.content: SHL Medical is excited to announce our first-time participation in the NSTC Science Train Program, 2022.
